aboutme.html:
I am currently majoring in Web Design and Internet Application Development program(3.9/4.0 GPA).
I chose to learn Web development because I feel that it could help me to make web-based applications easily and quickly on most of the devices - without rewriting codes. I also have experience in games, IoT development, Data Science.
At the same time, I am very interested in volunteer activities. I am one of the members in the SJA Federal District, so I was trained to be a first aider and healthcare provider.

experience.html:
Personal and Team Projects


Online Shopping

Sep. 2019 - Mar. 2020

An online shopping site for demonstration purposes. Built with React.Js, Laravel 6 and Material-UI.

Clear Campaign

La Hacks 2020

Clear Campaign is an analytics app, website, and tool that political candidates can use to find insights about their opposition and constituent viewpoints in key interest areas. Candidates can connect with clubs and organizations that have shared interested with, and lobbyists could be connected with candidates as well. Initially, we will focus on college campus organizations and elections and longterm on local, state, and then national elections.

Ottawa Valley Golf Association Dashboard

Feb. 2018 - Apr. 2020

GreenBirdies is golf membership management system made for academic reason. Code in server side is using Flask with MySQL Database.

PORT4YOU

Apr 6, 2020 - Apr 8, 2020

PORT4YOU is an open-sourced static personal website framework made by GatsbyJS. Port4you comes from the word portfolio. With PORT4YOU, you can create your own static personal portfolio site by editing Markdown files.
*This site was created by PORT4YOU.

Blog

Jun. 2018

A personal Blog made by Django2, SQLite and BootStrap4.

TeleBot

Sep. 2018 – Feb. 2019

A Bot of Telegram with some tools and the Kijiji helper with Multi-threads

Kijiji Helper

Apr. 2018

A web crawler for the products on Kijiji in the Ottawa area.

TODO List

May. 2018

A TODO List HTML5 application made by Laravel and React.Js.

Smartiome

Mar. 2019 – Present

An Event-driven-architecture and cross-platform framework that is able to manage IoT devices with plugins.

Carpool

June. 2019 – Present

An Open-Sourced carpool website made by Spring Boot, MySQL(MariaDB) and React.Js..

The VR Tech-Cutting

Feb. 2018 - Present

A Virtual Reality game made by Unreal Engine 4 that’s cutting the objects come to the players and count the score.


Academic Projects


Banking System – Web Version (ASP.NET Web Forms with C#)

A Banking System built on APS.NET Web Forms, which allows the user to create accounts and the user is able to deposit, withdraw, transferring money between Checking account and Saving account or getting information via the website. The web server will create a session for each of the users. Most of the logic part of the code in the backend is based on the Banking System – Console Version.

CST8257-Project

CST8257 is a photos managing system made for academic reasons. The code on the server-side is using PHP with MySQL database. Key features: Register New Users, Login and Logout, Add Friends, Create Albums for private or shared with friends, Upload images, Personal Gallery and Gallery Shared by Friends, Rotate Images' View in Gallery, Remove Images in Gallery, Download Original Image.

Restaurants Viewer

A restaurant management system base on ASP.NET Core MVC and ReactJs. The backend WCF service was coded by C#.Net. The frontend uses ASP.NET Core MVC and ReactJs.

skill.html:
• Design interactive frontends with some frameworks and technology stacks, such as ReactJs, GatsbyJs, Snap.SVG, Bootstrap, MaterialUI, JQuery.
  • Development of RESTful APIs, WCF Services, models, middlewares, and classical MVC controllers with Django, Flask, Laravel, ThinkPHP, JAX-RS, ASP.NET Core MVC, Webform and SpringBoot.
  • Skilled at using mainstream Linux/BSD distributions; including compiling software, creating and deploying Docker images.
  • Capable with calculus, essential statistics and trigonometry.
  • Training data models with scikit-learn, and able to adjust parameters for Decision Trees, Random Forest, Support Vector Machine, Naïve Bayes.
  • Working effectively in teams or groups, and strong leadership.
  • Making artworks with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, Audition, After Effect, Premiere, and making audio work on FL Studio and garage Band.
  • Health Care Provider.
